archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.7: ICS environments should be classified from an information security-related perspective (e.g. as critical, important or standard) to help manage information risk effectively, prioritise information security improvements and allocate appropriate resources.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
